name: City Bus Simulator Game 2016
description:
City Bus Simulator Game 2016

Welcome to City Bus Simulator Game 2016.

City Bus Simulator 2016 game is the latest and most creative simulation game that lets you pick up and drop off passengers as the ideal bus driver.

Play the best of city bus games in City bus simulator 2016 edition. This Real City Bus Driver game takes real bus driving to the next level of modern bus simulator 2016. City bus games’ lovers fulfill your thrust for driving real city bus.

something different than regular boring parking games? If your answer is yes than this one is just for you!
City Bus Simulator is a real bus driving game with high quality graphics and gameplay.

key features:

- Realistic Bus driving experience
- Perfect HD graphics
- Easy to control
- Real Bus sounds
